name: Feedly v.20 minimal (not maintained)
description: This style changes nearly all the default individual line-heights to be inherited (set relatively as 1.12*[current font size] in the body). This way you can still use that property, i.e. without *{line-height:inherit !important}. A few other modifications for a more dense (but readable) layout are applied. This leaves any coloring preferences up to you.

user.name: sharethewisdom
user.about:
I like keyboard navigation, which also makes browsing more pleasant. I find it strange that web developers use so many unnecessary margins and sub menu's. 
That's why I currently (October 2013) use Firefox 23.0.1 with vimperator 3.7.1 and some interesting plugins from here https://github.com/vimpr/vimperator-plugins.
